titleStmt.title: Popery banished with an account of their base cheats, especially, making the Word of God of no effect. And that their worship, although contrar to the Holy Scripture, they call best. January 17 1688[/]9. This may be printed. Rob, Midgley.
titleStmt.author: Midgley, Robert, 1655?-1723.
